summary: WHEN APPLYING  BRAKES AT 35MPH  THERE WAS  HEAVY VIBRATION , LIKE FALLING APART. DEALER CHANGED ON SEVERAL OCCASION  ROTORS AND PADS UNTIL GUARANTEE WAS OVER. RECENTLY MIDAS PERFORMED A JOB ON THE ROTORS AND PADS.HOWEVER,  PROBLEM STILL REOCCURRING.  PLEASE PROVIDE FURTHER INFORMATION.  *AK
